name: 2D RACER (lpiv7)
description:
2 player racer, can you beat the other player to get that victory?

player 1 KEYS: W,A,S,D

player 2 KEYS: ARROW KEYS

The aim of the game is to try beat your opponent to be the first player to reach 10 laps completed. 

the game will auto stop once one of the players reached 10 laps before the other player has.
